titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of March 28, 2011, through April 1, 2011, as National Assistant Principals Week.
Expressing support for designation of the week of March 28, 2011, through April 1, 2011, as National Assistant Principals Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of National Assistant Principals Week.
Honors the contributions of assistant principals to the success of students in schools.
